pic.title: www.authorizedprocess.com
pic.description: Site design: ASP, CSS, HTML. All graphics created in Illustrator. All pages are validated W3C XHTML 1.0 Transitional.

pic.title: www.dirtyhairdesign.com
pic.description: Site design: Flash, ASP.NET, MSSQL database. Administration page includes photo uploader, thumbnail generation and the ability to update image properties or delete the images entirely. XML data is provided through a custom .NET ASMX web handler. Features thumbnail scroller with dynamic image titles and descriptions.

pic.title: www.dirtyhairdesign.com/admin
pic.description: Site design: Flash, ASP.NET, MSSQL database. Administration page includes photo uploader, thumbnail generation and the ability to update image properties or delete the images entirely. XML data is provided through a custom .NET ASMX web handler. Features thumbnail scroller with dynamic image titles and descriptions.

pic.title: Chop wood, carry water

pic.title: Chop Wood, Carry Water
pic.description: Here is the final tattooed version of the previous illustration. I really love how the tattoo artist captured and improved the details of the wood. How cool is that, to have someone tattoo your art on themselves! Artwork belongs to user ponkeyjoe at worth1000.com

pic.title: International Talk Like a Pirate Day
pic.description: Here is my final entry for the Talk Like a Pirate Day contest on Zazzle.com. I was really happy how it turned out in the tshirt preview. Lots of fun!

pic.title: Sharp Stick
pic.description: From the old adage: "I need a sharp stick so I can poke my eyes out." This has been a running joke at the office now for a while, so I thought I would diagram it.
